title: Art Basel recap (Beeple, JUUL, Cathie Wood) + reacting to Better.comâ€™s leaked layoffs clip | E1341
description: All news today. Jason recaps his Art Basel experience (1:55), meeting Beeple, being ultra candid with the JUUL CEO (6:58) and interviewing Cathie Wood & Tiffany Zhong about crypto at 500 Global's Pre-Money conference (17:23). Then, he breaks down the Better.com CEO's 900-person layoff over Zoom (31:36).
